name: AMQP Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 AMQP Trigger 节点。主要用于: Listens to AMQP 1.0 Messages

sink.name: sink
sink.description: Name of the queue of topic to listen to
sink.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queue / Topic | 作用: Name of the queue of topic to listen to

clientname.name: clientname
clientname.description: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues
clientname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Clientname | 作用: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues | 提示: for durable/persistent topic subscriptions

subscription.name: subscription
subscription.description: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues
subscription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subscription | 作用: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues | 提示: for durable/persistent topic subscriptions

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: containerId (值: None) - Will be used to pass to the RHEA Backend as container_id
jsonConvertByteArrayToString (值: None) - Whether to convert JSON Body content (["body"]["content"]) from Byte Array to string. Needed for Azure Service Bus.
jsonParseBody (值: None) - Whether to parse the body to an object
pullMessagesNumber (值: None) - Number of messages to pull from the bus for every cicle
onlyBody (值: None) - Whether to return only the body property
parallelProcessing (值: None) - Whether to process messages in parallel
reconnect (值: None) - Whether to automatically reconnect if disconnected
reconnectLimit (值: None) - Maximum number of reconnect attempts
sleepTime (值: None) - Milliseconds to sleep after every cicle
